name: Fetch Payout
description:
#### Fetch or Verify Payout

Fetch a payout record using payout reference.

Endpoint: /payout/:reference  
Method: GET

#### Header

| Param | Type | Required? | Decription |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| _authorization_ | string | Yes | Set value to _Bearer SECRET_KEY_ |
